entries.title_d: The Blacklight pirate leader is within your grasp, don't let him slip away!
entries.title: Endor system: Assassinate Blacklight Leader
entries.quest_target_d: Pirates often obtain their rank through their combat skill so the Blacklight pirate leader will probably be a tough opponent. He's also bound to be heavily guarded so prepare for a bloody battle.
entries.quest_location_d: You're heading straight for the center of the Blacklight pirates area so be prepared for anything!
entries.quest_escort_t: Teach the Blacklights to fear us.
entries.quest_escort_d: Eliminate the leader's retinue as well, it's time to teach these pirate scum a lesson!
entries.failed_escape: Pilot! You've failed your mission! Return to Ezkiel for further instruction.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Vortex Command: < Your work isn't over yet, pilot. His cronies are gone, but you still have the Blacklight leader to deal with. Proceed with your objective! >
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Scanning... ... Remaining Blacklight enemies in the area: %DI >
entries.destroy_escort: You've successfully assassinated the leader, but his cronies won't let you go unscathed. Destroy them all!
entries.assassinate_success: Excellent! You successfully assassinated the Blacklight Pirate leader. The Spynet will undoubtedly be grateful. Return to Ezkiel for further instruction.
entries.arrival_phase_2: There he is! The Blacklight Pirates are known for their dogfighting, so be careful. Good luck, pilot. We're counting on you.
entries.arrival_phase_1: We have pinpointed the ship of the leader of the Blacklight pirates and are uploading his coordinates to you now, stand by.
